price: Većina onih koji te dozivaju ispred soba nije dovoljno pametna.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلۡحُجُرَٰتِ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yunādūnaka min warāi al-ḥujurāti aktharuhum lā yaʿqilūna
